affected-game.description: Name of the game that is targeted by the cheatware.

cheat-name.description: Known name of the game cheat, if given.

cheat-screenshot.description: Screenshot of the cheat at work.

cheat-version.description: Any information about the cheatware version.

compilation-date.description: Compilation date of the game cheat, if known.

creator.description: Individual and/or Group and/or Organization that created the cheat.

ig-cheat-behaviour.description: Describe the in-game behaviour of the cheat (e.g. You selected 'Aim Bot', here you can add details like 'Activate by pressing F7, Deactivate by pressing F8. Not detected be Easy Anti-Cheat.')

implementation-details.description: Additionnal informations about the implementation of the cheatware. (e.g. Requires to swap a dll file.)

operating-system.description: Operating system required and its version.

webpage.description: Place where the cheat is promoted. Website, Forum, Download page, ...

description: Describes a game cheat or a cheatware.
name: game-cheat
